issue.title: world frame does not go with tf across network

content.raw:
It does not make sense that the robot on Mars would not have a world frame. All the values in the data messages are relative to the world frame. If this is not going to be the case, then we would need new data messages to send to the controller. There has been no indication that we are getting new data message types.

This confusion highlights the need to get the AWS Cloud practice SIM as soon as possible. It would be a shame to spend a lot of time developing something based on certain assumptions that turn out to be incorrect.
